## DefaultConfiguration.get() method

Get configuration option value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>string</code> | Configuration option key. |

<b>Returns:</b>
